meanings.definition: A course of study offered via television.
meanings.sent1: I learned a lot from the telecourse about animals.
meanings.sent2: She signed up for a telecourse on history.
meanings.sent3: The telecourse on cooking made me hungry every time.
meanings.sent4: The telecourse on gardening bloomed new ideas in my mind.
meanings.sent5: The telecourse on space exploration took me on a journey through the stars.

meanings.sent1: He telecourses in math to improve his skills.
meanings.sent2: They telecourse regularly to expand their knowledge.
meanings.sent3: Telecoursing in art always brings out his creative side.
meanings.sent4: She telecourses with enthusiasm and dedication.
meanings.sent5: Telecoursing through different subjects broadens your horizons.
